project.name: Platform Bill of Materials
project.description: Java Spring Platform Bill of Materials Migrating to Spring Framework 5.3.x (https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Upgrading-to-Spring-Framework-5.x) It tracks closely latest iteration of Spring Boot 2.5.x

requireJavaVersion.message: You are running an older version of Java. ${project.artifactId} requires at least JDK ${java.version}

requireMavenVersion.message: You are running an older version of Maven. ${project.artifactId} requires at least Maven 3.6.1
